english.segment1: Whatever I hear You say I'll do. Whatever You want I want it too. Whatever You say. Whatever You want. I live for You
english.segment2: Wherever I run I run to You. Wherever You lead I'm going too. Wherever I go. Wherever You are. I live for You
english.segment3: And I give myself away. Every single day. Over and over again. You're the only thing true. And I give myself to You. Over and over again
english.segment4: There are so many ways to say. The one thing I feel today. All I want is all You want. I live for You
english.segment5: And I give myself away. Every single day. Over and over again. You're the only thing that's true. And I give myself to You. Over and over again (oh yeah, oh yeah yeah)
english.segment6: All I want. Is all You want. To live for You
english.segment7: And I will always give myself away. Every single day. Over and over again. You're the only thing that's true. And I give myself to You (yeah). Over and over again (yeah)
english.segment8: You're the only thing that's true (yeah). So I give myself to You. Over and over again
